title: Worldwide shipments of smart watches 2013 to 2015
summary: Overall Shipments in millions has increased over the Year.
Shipments in millions is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015.
The line significantly increased by 17.48 from Year 2014 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Shipments in millions, of value 24.92 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Shipments in millions, of value 7.44 was reported at Year 2014
